attributes.action: Don't let Catholic secondary schools make RE GCSE mandatory for students
attributes.background: Forcing students to do RE GCSE who do not want to means that they are being restricted from choosing other subjects that they do want to do.

rejection.details:
The decision on what GCSEs are mandatory is one for each individual school and not a decision for the Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about religious education in English schools here: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/190260/DCSF-00114-2010.pdf
